text:
Lost in Thought

Raskolnikov stares blankly at the wall.

Raskolnikov: “It will be long before I get rid of them.”

Razumihin: “What money was all that bought with?”

Raskolnikov: “Money? My mother sent it?”

---

Razumihin frowns, sensing Raskolnikov's turmoil.

Razumihin: “Have you forgotten that, too?”

Raskolnikov: “I remember now.”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Raskolnikov reflects on the money sent by his mother while feeling sullen and uneasy.
